title: Time Lapse Drone Video “Climbing” to the Top of Mt. Everest
content:
This 4K drone video from @liulangCookiâ€¬ takes us on a journey from the base camp at 17,400 feet all the way to the summit of Mount Everest. Along the way, you can see tiny little people hiking up and the paths they take. Very cool.
